required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Cardiotoxicity and Hypertension in Patients With Non Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostatic Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Cardiotoxicity and Hypertension in Patients With Non Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostatic Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a prospective observational study on a cohort of patients with castration-resistant prostate cancer M0, treated with Apalutamide, at the Oncology Unit of the "Andrea Tortora" Hospital of Pagani. Data will be collected on the patient's clinical history and the treatments carried out until the start of therapy with Apalutamide. At that time the study will be described to the patient and informed consent will be given.
In case of a favorable opinion from the patient, the CRF will be filled in. Patients with CRPC M0 treated with Apalutamide, belonging to the Oncology Unit of the Pagani Hospital "Andrea Tortora" and of the other Oncology Units of the ASL of Salerno (Hospital of Vallo della Lucania) will be studied with the possibility of enrollment also from other Centers outside the Salerno ASL.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of arterial hypertension, by creation of a weekly blood pressure diary, 24-hour blood pressure holter every six months
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of arterial hypertension, by creation of a weekly blood pressure diary, 24-hour blood pressure holter every six months

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of biochemical response, such as 50% change in total PSA from baseline in patients receiving apalutamide
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of biochemical response, such as 50% change in total PSA from baseline in patients receiving apalutamide

secondary_outcome.measure: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and time to onset of metastases, assessed by PET PSMA or bone scan or CT scan
secondary_outcome.description: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and time to onset of metastases, assessed by PET PSMA or bone scan or CT scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and overall survival
secondary_outcome.description: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and overall survival

secondary_outcome.measure: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and occurrence of serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Relationship between changes in blood chemistry parameters and occurrence of serious adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Association between basophil count and appearance of skin rash
secondary_outcome.description: Association between basophil count and appearance of skin rash

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of drug interactions with Apalutamide
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of drug interactions with Apalutamide

arm_group.description: CRPC patients without evidence of distant metastasis are eligible

study_pop.textblock: CRPC patients without evidence of distant metastasis and in treatment with Apalutamide

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- CRPC patients without evidence of distant metastasis are eligible
Exclusion Criteria:
-
